name: Shopping-esy App
techStack: Vite, ReactJs-18, TailwindCSS (media query),Typecript, Vercel, Framer motion, Jest(unit testing)
conclusion: Implemented global state with Context API, persisted cart with local storage, and added search, filtering, sorting by category, price, popularity, and rating.

name: Strong Minded App
techStack: Vite, React Js-18, TailwindCSS, Vercel, React chat-bot
conclusion: Integrated a user-friendly chat bot, updated routing with createBrowserRouter, routerProvider, Outlet, Link, useParams, and NavLink for nested routes.

name: N-MAB Penalty Calculator
techStack: Next Js-14, Typescript, TailwindCss, Firebase, Vercel
conclusion: Scored 100 on PageSpeed Insights, integrated Firebase authentication, enforced login for calculator access, and implemented protected routes using Context API and useEffect.
